content.raw:
Sorry I'm late to this. Just thought I'd mention that bullet has separate classes for cylinders oriented along different axes:

* y-axis: [btCylinderShape](https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/blob/master/src/BulletCollision/CollisionShapes/btCylinderShape.h#L23)
* x-axis: [btCylinderShapeX](https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/blob/master/src/BulletCollision/CollisionShapes/btCylinderShape.h#L137)
* z-axis: [btCylinderShapeZ](https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/blob/master/src/BulletCollision/CollisionShapes/btCylinderShape.h#L160)
content.html:
Sorry I'm late to this. Just thought I'd mention that bullet has separate classes for cylinders oriented along different axes:

  • y-axis: btCylinderShape
  • x-axis: btCylinderShapeX
  • z-axis: btCylinderShapeZ
